name: yum some
description:
Description:
Yum some!! is a cooking/Rage game made for all ages. Its compelling action will draw you in and push you away due to the immense challenge it presents.

WARNING:  INCLUDES MULTIPLE MINI GAMES, SO BE SURE TO PLAY PAST THE FIRST ONE

A Thank you:
Thank you to all those who left feedback it is very much appreciated. If you leave a link I will gladly rate your game as well. 

Tools:
Game engine: Unity 2017.3.1;
modeling software: blender;
music software: bosca ceoil;
sound effects: www.bfxr.net (Generated);
graphics: aseprite;
